title: I knew Jax was small but....
body:
At this point, he looks smaller than the yordles.

Why is Jax so tiny???

replies.body: Well, /someone's/ gotta represent the Lollipop Guild, and Teemo's too satanic for it.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=53bEFQ09,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-22T19:02:38.208+0000)
>
> Lolli-{{champion:78}} is more than enough. *shudders*

Somehow I forgot about that! How did I even...
I feel {{champion:117}} is somehow involved in this
